text: Osteopelta mirabilis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Osteopeltidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== Chatham Rise and off the Chatham Islands, New Zealand ==References== ==External links== * Bruce Marshall, Deep-sea gastropods from the New Zealand region associated with recent whalebones and Eocene turtle, The Nautilus v 108 (1994–1995) Category:Osteopeltidae Category:Gastropods described in 1987
title: Osteopelta mirabilis
